description: Removes the specified tags from the specified log group. To list the tags for a log group, use ListTagsForResource. To add tags, use TagResource. CloudWatch Logs doesn't support IAM policies that prevent users from assigning specified tags to log groups using the aws:Resource/key-name or aws:TagKeys condition keys.

parameters.name: logGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the log group.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tag keys. The corresponding tags are removed from the log group. (string) ---
